𓌃 𒄷𒄭𒌅 mut-tu Mast®
𓌃 𒄷𒄭𒌅 mut-tu “a pole” Marterpfahl?
𓌃 𒈬𒁺𒇻 mu-du-lu “a pole” ⇔ ma.tall?
𓌃 𒈬𒈬𒌓𒊒 mu-ud-ru scepter 𓌃 𒉺 "scepter"

? 𒈠𒆪𒌅 ma-ku-tu pole , post, staff

mot < mond "say, tell!" ⇔ ment 𓄣 mind
𒀀 𒆳 ᵠamat pheme™
𒀀𒆳 amat a mot a word 𒆳 < mount "tell"
𒀀𒆳 amat mind

𓅓 𓆓 𓂧 motto <> midice “as one says”

𒌝𒈠 ᵠumma pheme
𒌝𒈠 woman ⇔ gymna
𒌝𒈠 umma Amme : mother
